titleStmt.title: Master Broughtons letters, especially his last pamphlet to and against the Lord Archbishop of Canterbury, about Sheol and Hades, for the descent into Hell, answered in their kind

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by [F. Kingston for] Iohn Wolfe,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Broughton, Hugh. An explication of the article peri tou katelthein eis haidou.
With a final bifolium comparing Broughton's pronouncements with those of Miles Gloriosus; recto, column 1, line 3 up has "sayd".
Running title reads: An answer fitting Broughtons slaunderous letters.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
